categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The battle of Bresnia was a battle of the Galactic Civil War.
Sometime after the Battle of Yavin, Rebel agent Karlon was killed in a battle against Imperial forces on Bresnia.

After his death, Karlon's best friend, the Carosite medic Tamo Lan, took charge of his seventeen-year-old sister, Gondara. The Aqualish teenager, who had been living on an Alliance safe world while her brother fought for the Rebellion, subsequently entered active duty and became a member of Shroud Team.
